A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I never thought a movie would make me dislike Star Wars fans... but here I am. Rian Johnson tells a story through compelling performances (Hamill\, Ridley\, Driver) and does so in a fresh way. He not only continues the Star Wars story\, but expands the boundaries and pushes the force and the galaxy to edges its never explored before. The people saying this is worse than phantom menace may need to seek medical attention. The Last Jedi is not perfect\, but a triumph nonetheless.
